description: Returns information about the specified event stream in a specific domain.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The unique name of the domain.

parameters.name: EventStreamName
parameters.description: The name of the event stream provided during create operations.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The unique name of the domain.

nested_items.name: EventStreamArn
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the event stream.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the export was created.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The operational state of destination stream for export.

nested_items.name: StoppedSince
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the State changed to STOPPED.

nested_items.name: Uri
nested_items.description: The StreamARN of the destination to deliver profile events to. For example, arn:aws:kinesis:region:account-id:stream/stream-name.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of enabling the Kinesis stream as a destination for export.

nested_items.name: UnhealthySince
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the status last changed to UNHEALHY.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The human-readable string that corresponds to the error or success while enabling the streaming destination.
